markdown.content:
# ![GreyNoise Logo](https://files.readme.io/9ed004a-small-greynoisegreytrans.png) GreyNoise Intelligence Correlation Dashboard
---
The Correlation dashboard is designed to identify relationships of GreyNoise Intelligence indicators and events from other sources.

1. **IOC Match Visibility**: Monitor GreyNoise indicators matched in your environment
2. **Threat Classification**: Breakdown by Malicious, Suspicious, Benign, and Unknown IPs
3. **Geolocation Overview**:  Map-based visualization of IOC geographic origins
4. **IoC Filtering**: Time filter and classification filter for deeper analysis

dashboardCharts.name: 84c98d52-979f-465a-9faa-fc1d53d596ca
dashboardCharts.description: Pie chart visualizing the top 10 IoC categories of GreyNoise Intelligence IOC matches.

markdown.content:
# IOC Match Event & Trends
---
Monitor the volume and patterns of GreyNoise Intelligence IOC match events across your environment. Includes duplicate matches to show true activity volume, temporal trends, and detailed drill-down capabilities for security investigations.

dashboardCharts.name: 9d2c20ab-6134-4cbc-ad7c-0967c062fd22
dashboardCharts.description: Count of GreyNoise Intelligence IOC matches detected in environment in last 24 hours.

dashboardCharts.name: 6440b25e-b33c-4e37-9d3c-5d3097736c38
dashboardCharts.description: World map plotting the geographic origin of matched GreyNoise Intelligence IOCs.

dashboardCharts.description: Table of the 10 most frequently matched IPs from GreyNoise Intelligence with hostname details.

dashboardCharts.description: Count of IPs classified as suspicious by GreyNoise Intelligence.

dashboardCharts.name: 0a88ed3c-7994-4f5c-8855-ccb95c72a2a1
dashboardCharts.description: Count of distinct IP addresses matched against GreyNoise Intelligence.

dashboardCharts.name: 83d70ed9-e89c-450e-bc51-543badb5abbe
dashboardCharts.description: Count of IPs classified as unknow by GreyNoise Intelligence.

dashboardCharts.name: f2254e8c-ff39-4e51-9972-d0e5635f6c0e
dashboardCharts.description: Comprehensive investigation table displaying GreyNoise Intelligence IOC matches for in-depth analysis.

dashboardQueries.name: ea77791d-10ae-4b87-b449-9bb873e2451b
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name  = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$category = ioc.category
match: 
    $category 
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value) 
order: 
    $count desc 
limit: 
    10

dashboardQueries.name: 24783d1a-0ee1-454e-a0d8-80d3fb6d41ee
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
ioc.severity = "Benign"
outcome:
    $bening_count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value)

dashboardQueries.name: 94bed1dc-41e3-4a36-b399-1075f06afeb3
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
ioc.severity = "Unknown"
outcome:
    $unkwons_count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value)

dashboardQueries.name: 5533e9e6-4eb6-4ab2-bf06-c324f6e1395f
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
ioc.severity = "Malicious"
outcome:
    $malicious_count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value)

dashboardQueries.name: af1ca00c-2aaa-4fce-85a8-c6d14a4cc7c0
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match: 
    ioc.ioc_value 
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))
    $hostname = re.replace(re.replace(re.replace(arrays.join_string(array_distinct(ioc.asset.hostname), ","), ",,+", ","), "^,|,$", ""), "^\\s*$|^$", "-")
order: 
    $count desc 
limit: 
    10

dashboardQueries.name: 8ca1ff86-deb6-4e43-b4a8-8b52ca89e88d
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name  = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$classification = ioc.severity 
match: 
    $classification
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(ioc.ioc_value)

dashboardQueries.name: ce562901-40db-4b64-ac5c-bf6e000a7af3
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name  = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match:
    $country
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))
    $max_latitude = max(ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude)
    $max_longitude = max(ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: afd9e56c-9a1b-4eb7-afc7-279a74ff3da9

ioc.severity = "Suspicious"

dashboardQueries.name: 1682842f-e024-40f2-acd1-62fad62bb9dc
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name  = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match: 
    ioc.ioc_value 
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))
    $hostname = re.replace(re.replace(re.replace(arrays.join_string(array_distinct(ioc.asset.hostname), ","), ",,+", ","), "^,|,$", ""), "^\\s*$|^$", "-")
order: 
    $count asc 
limit: 
    10

dashboardQueries.name: bc6f537b-a1d5-49f4-a99b-3262b694b7bf
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
timestamp.now() - ioc.day_bucket_seconds <= 86400
outcome:
    $ip_count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))

dashboardQueries.name: e58f3f7e-46a6-4df5-99cf-18fc8f97669b
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
outcome:
    $ip_count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))

dashboardQueries.name: 06663147-2127-4821-9e7b-1a09abcebec8
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name  = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region!="", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match: 
    $ip, $classification, $category, $latitude, $longitude, $match_bucket, $country
outcome:
    $hostname = re.replace(re.replace(re.replace(arrays.join_string(array_distinct(ioc.asset.hostname), ","), ",,+", ","), "^,|,$", ""), "^\\s*$|^$", "-")
order:
    $match_bucket desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: c1d81b55-1e38-4767-9313-75afc3090a62
dashboardQueries.query:
ioc.feed_log_type = "GREYNOISE"
ioc.feed_name  = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = ioc.ioc_value 
$classification = ioc.severity 
$match_bucket = timestamp.get_date(ioc.day_bucket_seconds) 
$category = ioc.category
$latitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.latitude
$longitude = ioc.location.region_coordinates.longitude 
$country = if(ioc.location.country_or_region != "", ioc.location.country_or_region, "-") 
match:
    $match_bucket, $category
outcome: 
    $count = count_distinct(strings.concat($ip, "|", $classification, "|", $category, "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($latitude * 1000000)), "|", cast.as_string(cast.as_int($longitude * 1000000)), "|", $match_bucket, "|", $country))
limit:
    10000
